announcement.title: Amazon Bedrock announces Claude 3.5 Sonnet v2
announcement.description: New version of Claude 3.5 Sonnet available on Amazon Bedrock

research.overview: Amazon Bedrock is a fully managed service that makes foundation models from leading AI companies available through an API.
key_features: Multiple foundation models from leading AI companies
Fully managed service with no infrastructure to manage
Secure and private - your data is not used to train models
Ability to customize models with your own data
Integration with AWS services like Lambda, S3, and more
problems_solved: Eliminates need to manage AI infrastructure
Reduces time to deploy AI applications
benefits: Pay-as-you-go pricing with no upfront costs
Seamless integration with existing AWS services

pricing_details.notes: Pricing varies by model. Claude 3.5 Sonnet shown as example.

usage_examples.title: Basic Text Generation

announcement.title: AWS Lambda now supports Node.js 22
announcement.description: AWS Lambda adds support for Node.js 22 runtime

research.overview: AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that runs your code in response to events and automatically manages the compute resources.
key_features: Built-in fault tolerance and high availability
problems_solved: Reduces infrastructure costs for variable workloads
benefits: Only pay for compute time used
Automatic scaling to handle any workload
Built-in high availability and fault tolerance

pricing.pricing_model: Pay per request and compute time
pricing.free_tier: 1M requests and 400,000 GB-seconds per month (12 months)

pricing_details.notes: Free tier includes 1M requests and 400,000 GB-seconds per month

usage_examples.title: Basic Lambda Function
usage_examples.description: Create a simple Lambda function with Node.js 22

announcement.title: Amazon S3 Express One Zone storage class
announcement.description: New S3 storage class for high-performance applications

research.overview: Amazon S3 Express One Zone is a new storage class designed for high-performance, latency-sensitive applications.
key_features: Up to 10x faster than S3 Standard
problems_solved: Simplifies architecture for high-performance use cases
Improves user experience with faster data access
benefits: Lower request costs compared to S3 Standard
Seamless integration with existing S3 applications

pricing.pricing_model: Pay per GB stored and per request

pricing_details.notes: Pricing for S3 Express One Zone in US East (N. Virginia)

usage_examples.title: Using S3 Express One Zone
usage_examples.description: Create and use an S3 Express One Zone bucket
steps: Select 'S3 Express One Zone' storage class
